name: ElectroPets - Early Demo (Web Version)
description:
Take care of cute little desktop kittens in their own little virtual alien world with food, water and watch them grow! Many planned features to be included, but this demo will be updated to feature all the basics as they're implemented. ElectroPets

A developing Tamagotchi-like, idle, relaxing, ranching game that could double as a screensaver and interactive wallpaper for unused monitors/screen space. Maybe you'll take care of your pets longer than anyone else? Maybe you'll just enjoy their fleeting company.

This is the web version, play it above right in your browser!

Another tranquil night for the kitties

Credits/Thanks to:
Helianthus Games - For their Pixel Planet & Space BG Generators!
Elthen - For their Pixel Cat sprite sheet!

Windows Download Version:
